content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #167

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Request for a community-defined event registry

Submitted by Ron Parker on behalf of Kenn Sinn
HL7 Canada (ken.sinn@ehealthontario.on.ca )
Chapter/section: Event Catalog
Url: http://fhircast.org/specification/May2019Ballot/#event-catalog
Type: A-S Enhancement
In Person requested: Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Summary: Request for a community-defined event registry

Comment: Request for a community-defined event registry, similar to the one used for CDS-hooks. This prevents too much fragmentation later on, and may help identify common events for incorporation into the IG/standard.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

hl7-fhircast-bot labeled Issue #167

isaacvetter commented on Issue #167

Kenn!

Great idea. We suggested the same in #156.

Proposed resolution: Persuasive.

Isaac

isaacvetter labeled Issue #167(assigned to isaacvetter)

isaacvetter commented on Issue #167:

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/IMIN/Teleconferences

@NiklasSvenzen moved the following disposition, seconded by Wouter

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment: We will move the Event Catalog out of the base FHIRcast specification. We will also define a documentation template and process and syntax to define and mature a given event or set of events.

:+1: For: 9
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:

isaacvetter edited a comment on Issue #167:

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Vote (5-21-2019)

Meeting notes: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/IMIN/Teleconferences

@NiklasSvenzen moved the following disposition, seconded by Wouter

Disposition: Persuasive
Disposition Comment: We will move the Event Catalog out of the base FHIRcast specification. We will also define a documentation template and process and syntax to define and mature a given event or set of events.

:+1: For: 9
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
